reviews.review:
Gameplay - 5/5
Atmosphere - 5/5
Dialogues - 5/5

More puzzles, more story, more jokes, more testing, new mechanics, new characters and a co-op mode for two players...

Still no cake.
best game ever you get the portal 2 soundtrack free too
It's truly deserving of its rating on steam, continuously fun, ironic and puzzling fps.Absolutely Amazing Awesome rate it 10/10.
Лучшую головоломку сюжетом вам не найти.
特别好玩，而且最好和朋友一起玩。

Points positifs : histoire cohérente avec le 1 (lore), dans les meilleurs jeux coop (et bon jeu solo) très bon rapport qualité/prix, la communauté (toujours plutôt active) créé de nouvelles maps souvent (et de nombreuses sont déjà disponibles sur le Workshop) ce qui génère une durée de vie du jeu énorme.

Points négatifs : graphismes Source Engine ( donc pas très beau mais bon c'est le charme de la licence ^^ ).

Je recommande fortement.
:)
Its so good ive beaten most of the game in one day, if i got it earlier maybe i would've finished it.

что сказать..... прекрасная игра с кооперативным режимом и удобной механикой... здесь классные шутки и есть даже гардероб хотя я такого нее ожидал..  единственный минус в этой игре - это её сложность, это головоломка с порталами заставит вас кропотать над ней целый час!!! но тем  не мение это лишь один минус на миллион плюсов так что.......


10 синих порталов из 10.

Like many others have said, this is an easy-going puzzle game with a great story line. The graphics and level of detail throughout the setting are awesome. I don't remember exactly what the first game was like but I liked the concepts of the blue, orange, and white substances with each of their own movement effects. It took me 14 hours to complete but I was definitely taking my time and I have seen others beat it in only half the amount of time. The level of difficulty was challenging but not too hard that I ever needed a walkthrough. I also played it with the Steam Controller which was really fun. I have not played the co-op campaign or any online workshop stuff but I could easily spend a lot more time on those creating my own maps and trying out tests made by others.
portal games are must plays for everyone ever.

Vale muito a pena, mesmo depois de tantos anos.
A história é divertida, se você entende inglês vai rir bastante das piadas (principalmente no co-op) e das personalidade das IA's.
Fora da história temos o co-op, que é maravilhoso, os puzzles são bons e dão uma sensação de dever cumprido após resolver.
Um dos jogos que você tem o dever de jogar na vida :v
Good online with your friends... or your enemies.
Definitely one of the best games I've ever played...a favorite of mine for a long time. Portal 2 will never go out of style...until someone ports it to Source 2 of course.

Este é perfeito 
com ambientação ótima, enredo legal (e engraçado).
Se você gosta de puzzles, COMPRE, vale a pena
ps:O jogo é leve pra caramba.

A perfect game, no question. You don't get the sort of following that this game has by phoning it in. The puzzles are just difficult enough to stump you for a while, and it rights one of the only wrongs of Portal: it expands the story to an insane extent, making it the ideal intro to first person shooters and puzzle games at the same time. Again, it's not for nothing that every puzzle game ever is compared to Portal. You'll never get tired of the characters, who are terrifying and hilarious almost simultaneously. Trust me; I've played it enough to know.
Funny valve Creampie in the eye XD
Now you're... not thinking because you can't get the crazy british robot to stop screaming every other second. 11/10
Nejlepší hra kterou jsem kdy hrál
Потрясающая игра с интересным сюжетом и головоломками. Прошла сразу за первой частью и не пожалела. Хочется когда-нибудь увидеть и третью часть этой замечательной серии.
This game is very fun. I recommend you to play it. At some points very challenging but you can get through it.

Se non l'avete mai provato, da provare assolutamente

[h1] 스팀 게이머라면 반드시 해야할 명작 [/h1]
 
[*]포탈 1을 하고와야 스토리가 좀더 이해가 잘될겁니다. 포탈 할인할때 엄청나게 할인하니까 그때 포탈 번들을 사가지고 두 시리즈를 모두 하는것도 나쁘지 않은 선택입니다. (저도 포탈 번들을 구입함)
 [*]포탈 1엔 없었던 다른 오브젝트들이 추가되면서, 퍼즐이 더 재밌어지고 다양해졌고, 그 퍼즐을 스스로 풀었을때의 쾌감은 진짜 미쳐버립니다

 [*]마지막의 엔딩 ost는 정말 퍼즐을 풀려고 개고생했던 그 노고들이 모두 보상받게 해주는 여운이 깊은 엔딩을 선사해주었습니다.

[b] 할인할떄 꼭 사서 하세요[/b]
Побольше бы таких же качественных игр
